^ you're welcome.
Its located rite here..
Extras--> Configuration--> Enable Expert mode--> Expand Real time protection--> Expand Scan--> Click on Heuristic --> Then Uncheck "Enable AHead" --> Click Apply then Ok..

How do i generate them?
Well, its my little secret.. :)

[Edit]
Here are the NEW instructions.
1.To Prolong Activation Period, u must update your Avira Product manually.(Its for "PRODUCT UPDATES", "Virus Definition Update" has nothing to do with it)
Open Avira, Extras--> Configuration--> Expand update--> Product update and click "Notify user when new product are available". At Below, you must enter at least 3 days or more because if you update regularly, your product key will be expired or being blacklisted soon.


2.To make Scanning Faster (No false-positive), you need to disable the advanced heuristic analysis and detection (AHeaD) located in,
Extras--> Configuration--> Enable Expert mode--> Expand Real time protection--> Expand Scan--> Click on Heuristic --> Then Uncheck "Enable AHead"
Click Apply then Ok..

3.Enhance your internet Browsing/Downloading speed by performing a clean install of AIS and during the setup uncheck "Web Protection" and "Mail Protection".
As both don't play a significan't role in protecting your system as "Firewall" and "Scanner" do.
